alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:11PM CDT until June 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Custer County in western Oklahoma... Northern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... South central Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 911 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Vici to 6 miles west of Durham, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Taloga, Seiling, Vici, Canton, Hammon, Leedey, Reydon, Camargo, Hitchcock, Sweetwater, Oakwood, Strong City, Putnam, Angora, Moorewood, Eagle City, Crawford, Roll, and Durham. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills; Woodward
